lyrics:
44 contributorstranslationstürkçeprey lyricsverse 1
as long as you notice
im hoping that youll keep your heart open
ill keep mine open too
if you dont ask i wont tell
just know that just know that
it all hurts it all hurts just the same

chorus 1
something is wrong i cant explain
everything changed when the birds came
youll never know what they might do if they catch you too early
we need to fly ourselves before someone else tells us how
something is off i feel like prey i feel like praying

verse 2
as long as you notice
im hoping that youll keep your heart open
ill keep mine open too
so so ill probably take you aside
and tell you whats on my mind
but you youll just keep it inside
probably tell me that youre alright

chorus 1
something is wrong i cant explain
everything changed when the birds came
youll never know what they might do if they catch you too early
we need to fly ourselves before someone else tells us how
something is off i feel like prey i feel like praying
you might also likebridge
if i run if i run away ill never know
what you want
and if you go then i’ll never grow
im undone
let me slip let me slide
if you run ill be sure to let you fly

chorus 2
something is off i cant explain
you know what i mean dont you
something i saw or something i did that made me like this
could you help me
we need to fly ourselves before someone else tells us how
something is off i feel like prey i feel like praying
something is off i feel like prey i feel like praying

verse 3
so so ill probably take you aside
and tell you whats on my mind
but you youll just keep it inside
probably tell me that youre alright
so so ill probably take you aside
and tell you whats on my mind
but you youll just keep it inside
probably tell me that youre alright
outro
i dont want to fight
i dont want to fight
i dont want to fight
i dont want to fight46embed
